website_summaries.verdict: Oil-rubbed bronze for a classic look.
pros: Easy to put up, with thoughtful installation components included
The hooks sit straight out to the side, optimizing hanging space in small spaces
Sturdy and solid at a great price point
cons: These sell like hot cakes, so can be hard to find in stock or in large numbers

customer_reviews.title: Great Hooks For Robes AND Towels!
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality hooks! The finish matches our other Moen fixtures and "oil rubbed" accessories perfectly. Plus, we were able to use these as towel hooks in tight corners of our walk-in shower where a normal towel rod was impractical, thanks to the secure mounting, and they've been working out great! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Masta' C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: These Moen Gilcrest Double Door hangers are excellent. They are heavy duty, mount easily, & look rich and old. (The Amazon seller limits each buyer's account to 4 maximum - not enough for a new house, but Home Depot's online store has them for the same price with free shipping to one of their stores.) Bottom line these are heavy metal, great oil rubbed bronze coloring, well made & easy to install - excellent quality, good price.
customer_reviews.author: J Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This hook was easy to put up, looks good and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: If needing a smaller hook size, I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Like the design. The hook is smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: DHECK

customer_reviews.title: Great hooks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the series line for a new construction project. These work great. Nice value for the money, highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki & Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice robe hook at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe hook. Well made solid unit with great looks. Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: J. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Gilcrest set and they are quite lovely. Well built and very affordable. It makes my bathroom look so luxurious!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hook
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe hook. It looks great and gets the job done! We are very happy with it. It goes great with all the other fixtures, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: very nice, best price I could find
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item, excellent fixtures to secure to the wall
customer_reviews.author: C. Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: beautiful hook
customer_reviews.text: it looks beautiful! It was very easy to instal and it seems to be very well made. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: cjrob

customer_reviews.title: Color and Space smart
customer_reviews.text: It is a very fibrant color complimentary and has double hanging space. It is very nice accessory piece for the room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love The Details!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday and will install it on a wall in my closet. I felt the details in this robe hook were unique and set it apart from the rest. It is beautiful and goes well with the oil rubbed bronze in my Master Bathroom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rose

product_meta.title: Moen DN0803ORB Gilcrest Double Robe Hook, Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Surround yourself with the rich, intricate details that make the Gilcrest coordinating designs the height of elegance and drama. With its fluted details and subtle curves, the Gilcrest Double Robe Hook in Oil Rubbed Bronze is a beautiful addition to any space. Innovative design and rich embellishments don't mean that these designs are difficult to install; each comes with its own template and hardware.
